sentences.sContent: Guyana's railways were previously owned by private companies.
sentences.sCn: 圭亚那的铁路先前为私营公司所拥有。

sentences.sContent: The contract was awarded to a previously unknown company.
sentences.sCn: 该合同给了一家先前不知名的公司。

sentences.sContent: ...the scientist confirmed the snake was a previously unknown species after conducting a genetic analysis of tissue samples...
...The International Union for Conservation of Nature had previously considered the area a "possible range" for the species...
...Those students who previously turned to urban schools for better education now are moving back to their local rural schools...
...Where I had previously struggled to work while ill...

trans.tranOther: Previously means at some time before the period that you are talking about
